title: why i can't make threads at euw boards even thou my account is lvl 14 in euw server ?
body: it says i must be lvl 10  and i'm lvl 14 wtf

replies.body: You probably just needed a quick boards account sync to get your level to match your Summoner level. Making this post forced a sync and I can see you as level 14 now, should be able to post over there!
